title: Reactive table
description: A simple HTML table that gets fed with custom data
descriptionAbstract: The purpose of this webcomponent is to have an easy way to dynamically create a table by feeding data into it from the external DOM.

options.label: a JSON encoded string representing an array of objects that will be translated to table rows
a JSON encoded string representing an array of objects that define the schema of the input data
the output format for date objects using Moment.js tokens: https://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/
